mapper.select: select s.hs_no, m.m_id, m.m_name, s.hs_area, to_char(hs_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as hs_date, s.hs_time, s.hs_level, s.hs_people, m.m_phone, s.hs_progress, s.hs_etc FROM support s, member m where s.m_id = m.m_id and s.hs_no = #{hs_no}
mapper.insert:
select support_seq.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO support (hs_no, m_id, hs_area, hs_date, hs_people, hs_time, hs_level, hs_progress, hs_etc, hs_regdate, hs_status) values (support_seq.nextval, #{m_id}, #{hs_area}, to_date(#{hs_date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), #{hs_people}, #{hs_time}, #{hs_level}, 1, #{hs_etc}, SYSDATE, 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE support SET hs_area = #{hs_area}, hs_date = to_date(#{hs_date}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), hs_people = #{hs_people}, hs_time = #{hs_time}, hs_level = #{hs_level}, hs_progress = #{hs_progress}, hs_etc = #{hs_etc} where hs_no = #{hs_no}
UPDATE support SET hs_progress = 0 where to_char(hs_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') < to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') and hs_progress = 1
